meanings.sent1: The catchy tune was so hummable that everyone started humming along.
meanings.sent2: The hummable melody stayed in my head all day.
meanings.sent3: The hummable song made even the grumpiest person tap their foot.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like a hummable lullaby, soothing and comforting.
meanings.sent5: The hummable jingle in the commercial made it unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The hummable song was perfect for the music class to practice humming.
meanings.sent2: She chose a hummable tune for the karaoke night.
meanings.sent3: The hummable melody made the long car ride more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: The hummable rhythm of the drums set the perfect mood for the party.
meanings.sent5: The hummable nature of the song made it easy for everyone to join in.
